name: Kimberly Holcomb
text: Great place to buy work supplies!

name: Tina Quillen
text: The people who work here are the most helpful, most knowledgeable, kindest people that I could ever hope to deal with when shopping for anything. I recently had a dilemma where I had to send my husband to buy my hair color. I phoned ahead and the woman actually helped me to pick out a perfect color over the phone and had it ready and waiting on my husband when he walked in. I'll never buy my hair products anywhere else as long as I can get to Sally's in Jasper. This place goes above and beyond when it comes to having a helpful staff. Thank you Sally's!!

name: Melissa Smith
text: Friendly service

name: Patricia Hedges
text: Very rude worker!!

name: Jill Cooner
text: You people so rude thanks for upsetting my daughter .grow up and handle things better .will not be buying anything from u

name: Julia Horn
text: They are the best at Jasper , helpful in every way

name: Cathy Sanford
text: Great products

name: Edna Crews
text: Great !!! She did an excellent job helping me out. She gave good advice concerning my hair. I just pray now that the shampoo helps me. Thanks Alexis!!!

name: Vanessa Brown
text: The girl working there was super helpful and gave lots of recommendations.

name: DONNA GORDON
text: Great customer service

name: Rachel Graham
text: Helpful staff!!

name: Shea Steelman Ruark
text: Went in after a bad home color job looking for toner and a hair repair mask. Stephanie and the staff were so helpful. They listened to my issues and helped me find what I needed. The store is clean, well stocked and the atmosphere is friendly and helpful. Love this store!

name: Brianna Jones
text: Stephanie was awesome! I came in once to get something to add volume to my fine hair and what she recommended I still use basically everyday. Next time I came to get something she remembered me and she really helped pick out stuff that worked just as good!

name: monica Mclaughlin
text: The customer service was on point.

name: Laura Barnard
text: The manager and her team were so helpful! I needed to find some hair to add to my daughter's so she could have dance pictures taken. Her hair is really thin and short. They pointed out affordable options and were very patient.

name: Sylvia Ingram
text: I walked in the store and ask for help to find the things I needed. Two lovely ladies help me find them and gave me recommendations. A wonderful experience.

name: Trevino
text: That last reviewer is racist and the service is actually exceptional. The folks who work here have always treated me well. Who cares if they talk to one another?

name: Amber Allen
text: Great location. I did not know this was here. But they have everything!

name: XOTIC MONEY
text: THEY KNOW ME BY NAME THEY ARE SWEET LADYS

name: hollie duncan
text: Good customer service

name: Devin Hadden
text: Always pleasant to me

name: goth gf
text: nice employees and nice selection

name: Steven M. Hughley, Sr.
text: Great shopping experience. They had everything we needed

name: Amanda Blythe
text: Great stuff, great prices.

name: Jana Warren
text: these ladies ate spectacular! they know their stuff and I can't Express how grateful I am to all of you! y'all rock! + 5 more stars

name: Marilyn Quinones
text: Forced to give one star because otherwise I can't comment  my bad experience in this place.  I wouldn't even give it one. They have terrible customer service and one of their employees is very rude with customers I will never go to this Sally again

name: paula moore
text: I went to Sally’s at 5:00 on Tuesday April 20th. When I arrived an employee was licking the door. The hours on door states close at 7:00 so does this page.  I don’t know how they stay in business.

name: Alexandria Burden
text: It was my first time coming to this Sally’s. I went in with returns and a list with things I needed for my cosmetology kit for school. I had bought some stuff u didn’t need and needed to buy some more things that weren’t at another Sally’s I went to. Alana was so nice and she helped me find what I needed. She was patient with me and helped me find a lot of the stuff I needed. I felt so at home there. I would come back again Alana and the stuff were very welcoming and friendly!

name: Sonya Drake
text: Chere was extremely helpful as I was looking for gloves. She is always so professional everytime I have visited this store! Excellent service!!! I drive past atleast  four 4 other Sally Stores to shop here!!!!

name: Julie McMahon
text: Tiffany was awesome! She helped get everything I need and was very knowledgeable! If she didn't know the answer she found it! She is amazing

name: Chanda Hardin
text: Product I purchased Saturday was old and clumpy, couldn't return due to new store policy. This supposed to be a gel.

name: Marissa Jones
text: Always have an issue when I go there. I figured it was an one off but I've been there 4-5 times and staff are always rude. Even when I call ahead to see if they have something in stock they put me on hold and forget about me.

name: Savanna Telaak
text: Kimberly was a very rude manager. Dont waste your time here they wont help you and then the managers will tell the other store associates dont help that person.

name: Nancy Steele
text: Aisles are too narrow for wheelchairs.

name: Amber Bunch
text: Very friendly and helpful

name: DeLisa Ruffin
text: Employees  were very  friendly  and  helpful.

name: Lisa Williams
text: My Favorite Place For Hair Care

name: Jacqueline Crawford
text: This store have a good range of supplies and the customer service is awesome.

name: Tori 3of3
text: Kaylee was a angel sent down from the heavens! She was very patient & knowledgeable. She helped me compare products and gave nifty lil tips on how to get the effect I wanted. Apparently she does hair for her other job & had personal reviews on most of the products. 10/10 would recommend coming here if shes working.

name: Minute with Mom
text: Very knowledgeable staff and very friendly. I will definitely be a repeat customer.

name: Cathy Solis
text:
Excellent prices, helpful email coupons.
Love the ION sprays! The BOGO's are Great!

name: Sharon Thames
text: Rude manager. Didn’t want me to look at shears. Had an attitude the whole time. Talked down to me. So did the cashier. Didn’t seem enthused to be taking my business at all. I’d do to another store. This one was terrible. Guess they didn’t want my business.

name: Courtney Ayres
text: I love this place.  I love the supplies they carry to the customer service.  They always have what I need.

name: Carolyn Harris
text: Love the fact that if you don't like what you buy you can return for exchange or refund without a hassle as long as you have a receipt.

name: David Cosma
text: Huge selection.  Helpful staff.  However, prices are quite high.

name: Gracie Lopez
text: Like all other Sally stores. Good customer service.

name: Kimberly Williams
text: Very clean prices are reasonable

name: Alisca Simpler
text: Staff was very friendly and helpful

name: Rachel Davis
text: I bought a product and had nothing in it

name: Charles Adams
text: Great place hands down🙌🙌

name: Jake Sims
text: Great service here. They always cut my hair the way I want it done every time no matter who does it.

resp.text: Thank you Jake!! We appreciate you coming in!

name: Kellie Travers
text:
I came in today to get my sons hair cut, but unfortunately I had to leave before it was our turn. I wasn't expecting too long of a wait, but I was wrong...lol
These ladies are busy little bees! I love seeing the small shops in our town so active. Very friendly and seem to be well liked by all. It is a small shop, but it works. By the way, I love the old antique vanity you have up on display...awesome!
Ladies, I will be back for his next haircut and ill make sure I have time to spare in case there is a wait!

resp.text: Kellie, We thank You for your loyaltee, we work hard to get every one In and Out as fast and as we possibly can. Hope to see u next time. ☺

name: Dusty Summerford
text: Best Barbers around. Both are great with men's hair as well as women's. I highly recommend them!

resp.text: Dusty Summerford Thank You for supporting💈 Cut N Up Barber and Style 💈and Local Businesses in Hanceville Alabama 🎈

name: Shirley Williams
text: Great customer care .  Excellent hair styles. Not ever been disappointed

resp.text:
❤❤Thank you Shirley Potts, for taking the time to leave your thoughts.
We really appreciate your business..⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐❤❤

name: Robin Gardner
text: Kim And Amanda Are Amazing Me And My Kid's Always Go To Them To Get Our Hair Done Been Going To Them For Year's And Won't Ever Use Anyone Else ❤

resp.text: ❤Thank you Robin!! We appriciate your business...⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐😀

name: Ricky Bennefield
text: 1st time getting a cut here. Kim was great. Will be a repeat customer

resp.text: Thank you Rick Bennefield!!! And Thank you for taking your time out and leaving a review. See you next round!💈✂️💈

name: Jon A
text: Cut N Up Barber & Styles is the GREATEST. I mean Perfect haircut each and everytime and the staff is so friendly and Amazing I’m definitely recommending any and everybody to go here for you’re next haircut be you man woman or child they can do it all. It’s just an all around EPIC place for anything styles highlights haircuts etc. I’d give them 10 stars if I could 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 I guess I can lol. But trust me u won’t be disappointed 😁👍 if you don’t believe go there yourself you’ll see what I mean.

name: Y
text: The clerk was very helpful in assisting me trying to find what I needed. The store was out of the product and we discussed other products.

name: April Sanchez
text: The new manger at this location is horrible. I always hear loud talking coming from the backroom . They won't even let anyone use there restroom...Very rude!!!!  Nevertheless there always only one employee on the floor  and no one else to assist! Every time I come in its always a problem with there registers or taking my coupons.Their always rearranging the store which is messy  ...Super busy! Not enough time for customers!!! Needs more employees!

name: Shelli Kilgore
text: Great place to buy hair products...excellent assistance.

name: Jenn Plowman
text: The NORTHPORT location is often later than 9:00 opening their doors. Sometimes for "computer issues" and other times for no reason at all. The management has really gone downhill over the last year or so!!

name: Holly Harrison
text: Nikki is amazing!! She knows her stuff and products she helped me with my hair and told me what to do and everything came out perfect. Very sweet and bubbly ! Will be back to see her again.

name: Shirley Nicholson
text: Got the supplies that I went there to get and the employees was great

name: Kipper Johnson
text: A good store to find hair products at

name: Wendy Thomas
text: They always have my hair products on hand

name: Ruby Bonds
text: Good place for hair products

name: Falon Hall
text: Customer service was good as always, they had just what i needed.

name: alexandra clements
text: The ladies that work here are a God send. THANKS FOR THE HELP with the toner and the instructions cause everything worked perfectly. Love this store. Thanks Pam!!

name: Kristin Howell
text: I've gone in here several times over the last few months for hair color and the particular employee I have dealt with has been extremely helpful and knowledgable about the products. I've had help from a few different but this young lady seems to know more than the others who just seem to work there. The only thing I will say negative is that they aren't always properly stocked on items and seem to not have them in the correct places at times so the color samples are wrong. If not for that I would give 5 stars

name: Mary Beth Lassitter
text: The ladies that have either been working when I have been there or that i have spoken to whenever I have called have always been fabulous!  I have never had a bad experience here.  I will continue to shop here as well as recommend to all of my friends!

name: K K
text: I’ve been a customer with sally beauty for many many years. I’ve always been treated nicely everytime I’ve been in everyone has always been very nice and helpful until recently. There is a new woman there with red hair and wears glasses I think I heard an employee call her sherry? She was rude to me while in the middle of asking a question she told me to hang on. As if what she was doing was more important. She was then on her cell phone and then as I went to check out she told me to hang on once again. I’ll never shop there again until she is no longer employeed there. She’s in the wrong line of business. Very very dissatisfied and disappointed. Customer service always comes first or so I thought.

name: madee Thompson
text: The girls were helpful best products and best prices.. Oo and ULTA BEAUTY PARKED A MOBILE BILLBOARD in front of sallys kinda DIRTY and there on day two so its not a mistake...

name: Rebecca Stapp
text: amazing customer service, i love sally’s i have had ups and downs with doing my own hair but they are always there to help and give their advice. Thanks Mazie and Holly , many more but i am horrible with names.

name: Anique Bailey
text: It was fine really i didn't really find any faults.

name: Patrease Durgin
text: Very nice place to shop for all sorts of hair care products.

name: Cassandra Roberson
text: Great stock of supplies. Make sure you know or have researched what you are wanting because the have average expertise.

name: Free Me
text: The ladies are very  informative and helpful  ... Limited on supplies

name: Kasey Maldet
text: Drove all the way over there and got there at 7:10 and they don’t close till 8 and they had the doors locked they were INSIDE and wouldn’t let me buy stuff!

name: Valerie Cole
text:
If you are looking to buy hair color this is not the place to go. You don't know what color you're about to buy as nothing is in order and they do not have the hair color samples out and the ones the do, do no not macth the color in the box .
there is nothing in order and they have limited supply.
Guess I'll be driving clear across town to the other location.

name: country girl
text: Good selection but limited quantities

name: khalil A.
text: Did

name: She Mac
text:
Sorry - if you truly want to eliminate plastic from your brand do not start by charging your customers for a paper bag.
...  Have your suppliers get on board.
This attempt is just cheesey

name: Heather Murphy
text: I spent almost 50 in there yesterday on 3 pls nails the new jail one less then 24 hrs they done broke going to get groceries when I was bringing them in got the good glue to they was beautiful

name: Carla Gezelman
text: Sales people are extremely nice. Everytime I walk in I am treated and get personal help to get what I need.

name: Amanda Craft
text: I always head to Sally's for all my hair coloring and finger nail polish.  The staff are very helpful and know what they are talking about. I am enrolled in their program they offer and it has been great. I get $5 off often and free shipping if I order online.

name: Bozoolie Montalto
text: The people who work there are always very helpful.

name: Glenda Bradford
text: You can normally get what you want in the hair color line

name: Crystal Poinsettia
text: The people there are very helpful. Two young ladies working without managerial assistance and doing a darn good job.

name: Cassie Mcmurtrey
text: Always great employees always helpful.

name: Gloria Etheredge
text: Very friendly

name: Emily Kathryn McCann
text: Clean, good location

name: Trudy Dalton
text: The little girl working there was from another store but she was very nice and helpful.

name: Lynn Williams
text: Clean store and very knowledgeable staff, she was so much help with all my purchases....from nails to hair.

name: Tina Hale
text: Found all products I needed, the manager very nice and helpful.

name: Jason Wells
text:
The manager is the most un-professional manager I've ever seen.
I'm in management and I would never bless my employees out in front of costomers.
They need a new manager there.  Bad. Can't stress that enough.
I plan to share this all over town to get this place out of business until the manager is replaced.  Once again... if the corporate office sees 👀 this....
You're not gonna have a good business unless you replace the manager.

name: Jennifer Betterman
text: Love the service they give and always there to help

name: Blake
text: Unhelpful and disrespectful employee. Didn't catch the name of her unfortunately or I'd go into a more detailed complaint.

name: Sandra Scott
text: Very knowledgeable & friendy service. Love the variety of products.

name: erien sanches
text: one of the workers is really rude

name: Lenore Buchanan
text: This store has hair products for all hair types. They also have a discount card and super sales each month.

name: Victoria Goldizen
text: All the ladies are very helpful! Love it there!

name: Paula Garcia
text: Nice store, very friendly and helpful staff.

name: Malinda Masters
text: I love Sally's

name: Denise Wooten
text: Always pleasant

name: Laranza Bell
text: Today the two people in the store closing up had the doors locked and the sign turned off 15 minutes before closings. We tried to open the door, and they just looked at us. The girl smiled at us while we walked away.

name: Joe Stewart
text: Service is always great but just wondering why their Barber clippers are 70 dollars higher than what you can buy on amazon with free shipping. Sally's 208 for Oyster 76 and Amazon 138?

name: Wanda Bain
text: Very nice clean business. The ladies are always very helpful to me.

name: Linda Penland
text: The sallys in the exchange  is out of business

name: Ann T
text: There is a lady that has Beautiful Short Silver hair that’s so very helpful. Also a young lady there that has red hair and she is the same! It is classy n so are they !

name: Renee Mondragon
text: The customer service was alright. I purchase over $30 worth of  Product and couldn't even get a plastic bag. I had to walk out the store holding my product in my hand. They charge you 15 cents for a bag when you purchase from them.

name: Brenda Alford
text: Clerk was exactly only that, she had no advice ,  nor input or even the knowledge of where product was. Of course she hadn't heard of even protein filler. Then actually tried to talk me out of 20.00 dollars worth of products.01/24/19

name: Liz Mayne
text: Very slow and not knowledgeable about anything. They never put forth effort." Out" of what i wanted.. then i find it on a display shelf. The checkout takes forever...ive never met a friendly employee except ONE in the 10 years ive been there. The older woman is very unhelpful and rudeish... shes very negative. Ive never been to cosmetology school but based on these people  and their lack of knowlegde,  Id be  be running the store in a week lol... i only go there because its the ONLY store that carries.. feom now on ill be ONLINE shopping!

name: Becca A. Ali
text: Very helpful staff and friendly as well ! 5 stars !!!

name: Bonnie Turner
text: Thumbs up

name: Joseph Ray
text: Good selection and service.

name: Ashley Moore
text:
Came in around 6pm today. Needed help with helping me find products to fix terrible hair dye that had been done.
Asked for assistance and immediately a sweet girl came to my rescue. She answered all my questions, gave me tips, showed me what products to purchase. Couldn't have been a better shopping experience without her.

When I was checking out, I finally realized she didn't work there. Big thanks to her friend who did work there for having her help me. This was my first time at this location. I will be back and recommending to all to go there.

Ps to the girl who helped me.  I manage a fitness gym Riviera Fitness Centerpoint. I help promote OUR MEMBERS BUSINESSES. COME SEE ME. WOULD LOVE TO HELP PROMOTE YOURS😊

name: Lenore Hervey
text: I usually enjoy my visit but, this visit was uncomfortable. I asked, if I could get some nippers. The manager said, what did you need. I said, the nippers. She said, nipples. This was very inappropriate. I said, to myself, you know like hell y'all don't have anything associated with the breast. I've been a repeat customer for many years and even worked for the company many years ago. Nipples, really. She needs to be more professional. Not funny at all.

name: O. Shanta
text: The prices are fair and the environment is clean. Staff always willing to help you find something. They also have discount cards for hairstylists.

name: lindsey buck
text: Wonderful,the ladies at the front were VERY helpful and polite! And new what they were talking about! Thank you!

name: Tiffany Battle
text: I swear they are the most sorriest employees I’ve come across. Never willing to help and has the audacity to not answer the phone to avoid helping people.

name: Tara Flowers
text: Employees great however I did not find the product in the store that was online.

name: Patricia Payne
text: The cashier was very friendly. The store was clean.

name: Corinna Bass
text: The Manager is so nice! I love this place and want everything in it!

name: Hannah Schiller
text: I spend too much money here, but they always have wheat I want in stock, the clerks are polite.

name: Jenean Austin
text: Very nice people

name: Laura Allen
text: Very helpful

name: Candice Payne
text: Been here multiple times, every time customer service sticks. Attitudes all day. If you know what you want and just don’t speak you MAY be okay.

name: Smile and Shine
text: Customer service is superb!

name: Brittani Harris
text: Store hours say opens at 9 am on Saturday. I get there at 8:58 am and sit an wait for them to open at 9 and they did not open at 9 am....not sure when they do because I wait 10 more minutes and they still didn’t open

name: Bri May
text: They seemed a little uninterested in helping , and the prices where higher then what most other stores where selling.

name: Q Ash
text: customer service needs to be a part of orientation......super rude will NEVER here again.....stay away

name: Nicole Elaine
text: Not helpful. I was looking to perm my hair and the lady gave us the wrong stuff my hair is still straight and even lost some of it's color due to this

name: PATTY MOON
text:
(Translated by Google) 🦋the girl is kind, the place is small but tidy and there is so much variety of products, for example, you will be depilatory and stuff 🦋

(Original)
🦋la chica es amable,el lugar es pequeño pero ordenado n hay tanta variedad de productos por ejemplo seras depilatorias y esas cosas 🦋

name: B Campbell
text: Being a beauty supply store you will find about anything but a little costly. Most staff is friendly and helpful.

name: Charenia Watson
text: I use to love Sally’s until they started charging for bags! The new staff is kind of rude don’t think I’ll be going back to the East Gadsden one.

name: Tammy F
text: I cannot wear a mask due to a medical condition. The cashier at Sally's refused to allow me to shop without a mask. She never asked if I had a condition that prevented me from wearing a mask, she simply said I could not shop without one. I am not required to share my medical condition due to hippa laws but if this cashier would have asked,  I would have shared. I still think she would not have let me shop. She was VERY rude and embarrassed me in front of a store full of customers.

name: Teija Cleveland
text: Employees were very friendly and helpful.

name: Joyce Shaneyfelt
text: ONLY PLACE I WILL GET MY HAIR CUT ,IM VERY HAPPY WITH MY HAIR CUT , AND HAPPY WITH MY HAIR CUT

name: Tesla Wallace
text: Good products. Helpful staff

name: C.Eric. Holcomb
text: Sally's beauty is a great place to go for all of you're hair care needs.

name: S Wyatt
text: Great selection and decent prices. Helpful, friendly staff. Usually easy access to parking (especially handicapped and ever expecting moms)!

name: tammy johnson
text: Wished the employee knew more about products and hair, but they are friendly and help the best they can

name: Misty Smith
text: Very friendly staff. We got there at 2 minutes until closing time. ( I thought they closed later)  They were very friendly and didn't rush us out the door.

name: Kim Ballew
text: Employees are very Helpful and nice

name: Kelly E
text: The ladies there are always helpful!

name: Annie Robinson
text: I really love you guys hair and the times you open

name: Jacob Atkins
text: Amazing selection of products. Staff is very kind and patient and helped me find exactly what I needed. :)

name: Chanda Mitchell
text: Anytime my hair needs a little TLC I just head to this store. The salesgirls really know their beauty products and I am always have with what they help me purchase.

name: Tammy Price
text: Nice staff.

name: Nancy Davis
text:
Daphne was so helpful when it came to pickng my new makeup for the holiday season's coming up!
Thank you Daphne , you're awesome and thank you Sally's!

name: Leslie Hahn
text: The staff was very knowledgeable about the products. Very helpful. I feel very comfortable with the advice given to me. Will definitely go back and recommend this place to others.

name: ShaNiethia Johnson
text: I have only had positive experiences at this location. The staff is helpful and arr very knowledgeable about the products!

name: Vance Torres
text: They don't have any threding. Probably cause it's mainly used by black females... We had to go to green springs to get it. Ridiculous. Then they say they never get it in.

name: Kimberly Willis
text: This is the second time I have went to this location, and both times I was disappointed. The staff are very RUDE, and do not offer to help you find a product at all. I looked at several hair products, and asked an associate about whether or not the store carried a particular brand. She stated, "No", then walked off. Later, while still browsing, I found that they did have products from this brand. Either she plain out didn't care, or does not know this store's products. Horrible location. Will not go here again.

name: casey quillen
text: They do their best to be helpful. In most cases they are correct. Hair is not always a perfect science. There are plenty of times it is a judgement call and without seeing the hair in question they can not be sure of the proper chemical reaction.

name: Cindy Wright
text: Very nice employees

name: Abby Askew
text: Super friendly!

name: Yung J
text: @Sallys on Cox Creek Blvd, I needed multiple things for my mother who is disabled but still wants to do her hair and nails and the most beautiful pink haired little employee helped me get everything on my mothers list!! I was verryyy pleased by the customer service and my mother is Verrryyy pleased with her products, I may need to stop by again soon.☺️

name: Katherine Elliotte
text: The employee was very nice. She helps me find the hair care product that I needed. She offered advice and instructions on how to use the products. Overall she was very very helpful. Great experience and great customer service.

name: Jakaeli Poole
text: Amazing customer service

name: Dalton O'Steen
text: First time visiting Sally Beauty. The sales associate was very helpful in finding what I was looking for.

name: Roger Coats
text: Had hair color my wife wanted and answered questions cheerfully

name: Cassie Mcmurtrey
text: I love this store!!!

name: Deirdre Howard
text: The  service is above board; the employees are very knowledgeable and helpful.

name: Gracie Woodward
text: I called to ask about if they had color contacts because I needed the soft tweezers that you can put contacts in and out with. The girl (Kelly) says "this is a beauty supply store I don't have anything like that." UMM NO WAY I HAD NO IDEA I CALLED SALLYS BEAUTY SUPPLY.... I mean really, if you don't like answering questions like that find a different job.... Like I didn't know who I called PSSSSH.... Rude

name: Brittaney Clark
text: There was a very rude lady in there today with long black wavy hair. All i wanted was help toning my hair. She was very rude and arrogant. I will not be going back here. Also when i callee to ask her name noone wanted to give it to me. Then told me that was the manager. Are you kidding me?

name: Marion McCloud
text: If you not spending enough money. You will not get a bag unless you pay for it. Ridiculous walking out a store with your items in your hand. I no longer shop there. Get it together people your prices is already high an you dont have a bag for me

name: Lindsey Walters
text: I had a great experience here. The staff was knowledgeable and actually introduced me to some new things. An employee named Ciara helped me, excellent customer service

name: Aja Daughtry
text: The Sally’s Beauty Store in Enterprise, Alabama has absolutely become the worst place ever. You go in they have nothing for professionals unless of course you’re looking for finger nail polish. You go and now they may have the store randomly closed in the middle of the day. The worst thing they could have ever done was get rid of the old management in the store. Unfortunately, when you’re in a bind needing a quick item, they’re the only option you have nearby without traveling 30 minutes or more. This pace has become a joke!

name: Kathy I
text: I was told about this store, from a friend. I'm glad that I went. The employee was extremely friendly and made sure that I was purchasing the right items. Very clean and neat.

name: Krystal Laing
text: Giving 5 stars because cashier/clerk Nikki was amazing. I brought my daughter in there tonight for hair dye, and we had little knowledge of what we were looking for exactly. Nikki took the time to explain everything while walking around with us to show us the right products. She was so very sweet, respectful, and nailed it in customer service! Also, my daughter's hair turned out great! Thank you again Nikki! Store was clean, organized, and products were easy to find!

name: Lori L. Ferguson
text: "Staff was Nice. HOWEVER, She Wanted Us to pay for Our bags to put Our Products in. PLUS, Their prices are high."🙏

name: Constance
text: The products are great there is a good range of choices on product branfs and whay not. The workers on the other hand are hit or miss. This shop has some great workers who are super helpful and knowledgeable... And then there are those who you have to find every two minutes and get "i don't know" as the answer for everything and they are completely unwilling to even attempt to find the answer.

name: Mandy
text: Always find what I need! Great customer service!

name: Body alignment class
text:
I come there quite often and buy all what I need. Very good deals sometimes.
The only frustration is some of the ladies there have no idea about products or give horrible service. The last time new lady was very unhappy to serve me, didn't want to give me information, was distracted listening others, didn't know how to deal with computer and seems like overall hated me.

name: JR Plotts
text: Great selection, reasonable prices, nice staff.

name: Skidamarink ADinkADink
text: Very pleasant and efficient staff!

name: Theresa Hooks
text: Great customer service

name: Kimberly Lolley
text: I went to Sally's today to find a product to take the yellowish tint out of my hair . The lady told me to use a toner and a developer  ,leave it in 10 minutes rinse and condition. I done all the above now my hair looks dark with a little of a purple tint. Very dissatisfied.  There needs to be a negative 0.

name: Samantha Beck
text: Very helpful staff. Friendly.

name: Rena Marson
text: Friendly staff.

name: Broke N Bored
text: Very nice employees,helpful.

name: Dana Abshire
text: Military discount on Sally's Beauty Club Card.

name: The Solitary Eclectic Witch
text:
No matter what time you call
the ph rings twice then goes to a busy signal. This makes their LOYAL shoppers MAD as they have to end up calling OTHER stores NOT in the customers area. DO BETTER SALLY’S

name: Rena Turner
text: I went in and was told i had to pull my mask up over my nose right away, no hello or hi nothing, she stayed pressed against the corner of store when i walked in.  NO problem, i am a rule follower, just hot so it was under my nose and frankly tired of the whole mask thing, but tried to be respectful of her!! However i needed a little help with finding a hair color product and walked towards the lady and was not even close to her, but she immediately held up both hand and yelled at me "STOP- STAY SIX FEET AWAY FROM ME!!! i told her i needed help, but she was extremely paranoid.  I understand being scared, but you work in public and absolutely have no customer service skills, whatsoever!!! She was extremely rude, and I ended up leaving because i couldn't get close enough to her or even ask a question before i bought product.  She said nothing to me.  Very disappointed in Sally's customer service.  I normally love shopping there.

name: Emily Brasher
text: Nice, helpful employees. Always out of alot of inventory

name: Chanda Mitchell
text: The employees are very helpful as they are very familiar with beauty products and where items in store are located. I love the discounts! I also recommend that if you shop here more than two or three times a year, get a Sally card! It will pay for itself very quickly!

name: Cari Brookshire
text: Sign on the door, "sorry closed today" ....

name: Terri Martin
text: Close to home, has all products I need.

name: M.&J Diaz
text: I love pell city sallys employees are very nice and helpful!!

name: Jenny Snyder
text: Website says close @8 pm. Store ACTUALLY CLOSES @7 pm. Drove a long way to arrive @ a closed location!!

name: Janice Trejo
text: They close way before the time on here

name: Jeremy Gossett
text: Wig heads 🤓

name: Bobbie Lee Bryson
text: Great staff!! Very helpful!!

name: Melanie Morgan
text: Love this place

name: Brandie Kay
text: Employees are always helpful.
